Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the scorpion NDBP 10 family
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.27912176] Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli (SBS 363)(MIC=1.56μmol/L);Pseudomonas aeruginosa (ATCC 27853)(MIC=0.78μmol/L);Escherichia coli (D31)(MIC=1.56μmol/L);Serratia marcescens (ATCC 4112)(MIC=1.56μmol/L);Enterobacter cloacae (beta-12)(MIC=25μmol/L);Gram-positive bacteria:Micrococcus luteus (A270)(MIC=1.56μmol/L);Staphylococcus aureus (ATCC 29213)(MIC=6.25μmol/L);Bacillus subtilis (ATCC 6633)(MIC=12.5μmol/L);Staphylococcus epidermidis (ATCC 12228)(MIC=6.25μmol/L);Fungi:Candida albicans MDM8(MIC=12.5μmol/L);Candida tropicalis (IOC 4560)(MIC=12.5μmol/L);Candida parapsilosis (IOC 4564)(MIC=50μmol/L);Aspergillus niger(MIC=25μmol/L);Cladosporium herbarum (ATCC 26362)(MIC=25μmol/L);Cryptococcus neoformans(MIC=6.25μmol/L)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.27912176] MHC=1.60μmol/L against human red blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Structure Description: The peptide adopts Helical fraction 0.04 in water;0.24 in TFE/Water;0.57 in POPC;0.44 in POPC:POPG;0.64 in POPC:DOPE;
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against the Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteria and fungi.It analog presented a reduction or similar antimicrobial activity when compared to model molecule, this analog had an increase on activity against Escherichia coli SBS 363, Bacillus subtilis and C. herbarum.

Literature.Title: Novel designed VmCT1 analogs with increased antimicrobial activity.
Literature.Author: Pedron CN, Torres MT, Lima JADS, Silva PI, Silva FD, Oliveira VX.
